title: IKEA Product Scraper
description: Extract product details from IKEA catalog including prices, images, ratings, and specifications. Supports multiple countries and categories.

startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: List of IKEA URLs to scrape (e.g., category pages, search results, or specific product pages). Leave empty to use default new products page.

country.title: Country
country.description: IKEA country code (e.g., 'gb' for United Kingdom, 'us' for United States, 'de' for Germany)

language.title: Language
language.description: Language code for the website (e.g., 'en' for English, 'de' for German)

category.title: Category
category.description: Product category to scrape. Use 'new-products' for latest items, or specify other categories like 'furniture', 'storage', 'kitchens', etc.

maxProducts.title: Maximum Products
maxProducts.description: Maximum number of products to scrape. Set to 0 for unlimited.

maxPages.title: Maximum Pages
maxPages.description: Maximum number of listing pages to process (safety limit).

collectDetails.title: Collect Product Details
collectDetails.description: If enabled, visits each product page to extract full details (description, features, measurements, all images). Disable for faster scraping with basic info only.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings to avoid rate limiting and blocking. Residential proxies recommended for best results.
